actions.committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Hearings held. Hearings printed: S.Hrg. 102-990.

official_title: A bill to provide for the energy security of the Nation through encouraging the production of domestic oil and gas resources in deep water on the Outer Continental Shelf and for other purposes.
short_title: Outer Continental Shelf Deep Water Production Incentives Act

summary.text: Outer Continental Shelf Deep Water Production Incentives Act - Amends the Outer Continental Shelf Lands Act to preclude, except in specified circumstances, royalty payments from leases located in certain waters until the lessee has recovered out of proceeds from such leases the capital investment costs related to production.

titles.title: Outer Continental Shelf Deep Water Production Incentives Act
A bill to provide for the energy security of the Nation through encouraging the production of domestic oil and gas resources in deep water on the Outer Continental Shelf and for other purposes.
